title: the poopoo peepee man: a story of violence
situation: It was a dark and stormy night. You're lying down in bed playing pp bot. Suddenly, you hear a sound from outside. What do you do?

options.result: You ignore the strange sounds and continue playing pp bot.
You get out of bed and look out your window. You see a dead body - Covered in shit. What now!?

> Hello? 911? There's a dead body! I'm scared!
> police: Sir.. Is it covered in poopoo..?
> Y- Yes, how did you know?
> police: \*hangs up\*
'Oh shit', realise. 'The poopoo peepee man has taken another victim'.
